data.title: Home - Graphwise
data.description: Graphwise combines the expertise of Ontotext and Semantic Web Company to provide a trusted solution in graph and AI technologies.

Bringing confidence to AI
=========================

Semantic Web Company and Ontotext have joined forces to become Graphwise

![Image 2](https://graphwise.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/graphwise-icon-3.png)

Enhance AI Performance
----------------------

We improve the accuracy and reliability of your AI models by leveraging our graph engine’s ability to analyze complex relationships and apply semantic reasoning.

![Image 4](https://graphwise.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/graphwise-icon-2.png)

Address LLM Hallucinations
--------------------------

We overcome the limitations of Generative AI and large language models (LLMs) by incorporating unstructured and semi-structured data into your data using our knowledge graph fabric processes.

![Image 6](https://graphwise.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/graphwise-icon-1.png)

Leverage Intelligent Applications
---------------------------------

We develop innovative applications like Graph RAG, virtual assistants, and question answering systems to streamline processes and improve customer experiences.

![Image 8](https://graphwise.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/graphwise-icon-4.png)

Get Accurate Search and Recommendation
--------------------------------------

We develop more accurate and personalized recommendation systems for various industries, driving customer satisfaction and engagement.

Unlocking information value with the most powerful AI
-----------------------------------------------------

There is so much untapped knowledge in an organization’s unstructured data that is now becoming accessible with new AI models. However, the first attempts still had significant deficits that culminated in machines with inaccurate and unreliable output.

Knowledge graphs are now the last piece of the AI puzzle and we’re excited to enable enterprises across the globe to truly reap the results and return on their AI investment.

### Podcast

A vision for Graph AI
---------------------

Atanas Kiryakov and Andreas Blumauer on why their two companies are joining forces to form Graphwise.

live webinar

Empowering LLMs with a Semantic Layer
-------------------------------------

Harnessing the Power of a Semantic Layer to Elevate your LLM



March 13, 2025 | 8:00 PM – 9:00 PM CET

[Register now](https://graphwise.ai/event/empowering-llm-semantic-layer/)

![Image 10: Andreas Blumauer](blob:https://graphwise.ai/70ce6aee2bbba07f009d5712cad469ab)

### Andreas Blumauer

Senior VP Growth, Graphwise

Advanced AI that meets the needs of the market
----------------------------------------------

Graph technology has found its perfect match: Generative AI. Only with the knowledge from the graph is AI now complete. This means more accuracy, more complete transparency, better decisions, less risk and, for the first time, a mature AI for your company.

![Image 12](blob:https://graphwise.ai/b5e35919b00af9f5e1474bb26aaf2bc0)

![Image 14](blob:https://graphwise.ai/b5e35919b00af9f5e1474bb26aaf2bc0)

Solutions that are ahead of the curve
-------------------------------------

AI is evolving rapidly but Graphwise has the human resources to keep pace and lead the way. Benefit from products and services developed by the leaders in graph technology and AI. We have twenty years of software development experience at your service.

A combined offering for enterprises based on two leading vendors
----------------------------------------------------------------

It is difficult for enterprise customers to navigate the fragmented market of graph and AI vendors and find solutions from a single source. That’s why we took the next step and consolidated our offerings. We are now one of the top 3 vendors and can offer you a single source solution that fits your size.

![Image 16](blob:https://graphwise.ai/b5e35919b00af9f5e1474bb26aaf2bc0)

![Image 18](blob:https://graphwise.ai/b5e35919b00af9f5e1474bb26aaf2bc0)

One-Stop-Shop for Graph AI
--------------------------

Graphwise has the platform and tools, the methodologies, and the people to deliver world-class end-to-end solutions to enterprises. Benefit from merged customer success teams that collaborate holistically on your use-cases and use their combined knowledge and integrated services to work faster for your success.

Scaled up for your benefit
--------------------------

Graphwise enters the arena of global players. New partnerships with the most important integrators and distributors strengthen the relevance and sustainability of Graphwise solutions. Our joint offering enables investment security from which every customer benefits.

![Image 20](blob:https://graphwise.ai/b5e35919b00af9f5e1474bb26aaf2bc0)

> … navigate the world of data with confidence …

This merger brings together two industry leaders to create one of the most comprehensive knowledge graph AI platforms in the world. By combining their expertise, Graphwise can help businesses unlock the full potential of their

AI investments and navigate the complex world of data with confidence.”

read more

Christian DirschlChief Content Architect, Wolters Kluwer Germany

[![Image 22: Wolters Kluwer](blob:https://graphwise.ai/8926269b42f3f03ae09104103f9180c5)](https://www.wolterskluwer.com/)

> … more cohesive capabilities for our clients …

As the world’s leading consulting firm in Semantic Solutions, we consistently review the range of software provider’s capabilities and future plans in service of our clients. For nearly a decade, we’ve chosen to work with both

Semantic Web Company and Ontotext, seeing the positive outcomes they’ve helped to deliver for our clients. As the industry is now converging around the concepts of enterprise AI and semantic layers, we are in complete support of this merger. In short, it means more cohesive capabilities for our clients, with a single, strong product roadmap and united vision for the future.

read more

Joseph HilgerChief Operating Officer , Enterprise Knowledge

[![Image 24: Enterprise Knowledge](blob:https://graphwise.ai/e8a57f4972516a1d3218894eabc89576)](https://enterprise-knowledge.com/)

#### Resources

*   [Graphwise Platform](https://graphwise.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Graphwise-Platform-leaflet.pdf)
*   [Press Release](https://graphwise.ai/graphwise-press-release-general/)
*   [Graphwise Company Factsheet](https://graphwise.ai/graphwise-factsheet//)
*   [Media Kit](https://graphwise.ai/graphwise-media-kit/)
*   [Podcast](https://graphwise.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Graphwise-Podcast.mp3)

Graphwise enables organizations to unlock ROI for enterprise AI by delivering the most comprehensive and trusted industry solution in the field of knowledge graphs and semantic AI technologies. As enterprises pour millions into AI investment, Graphwise delivers the critical knowledge graph infrastructure to ensure enterprises are ready to realize the technology’s full potential, is trusted, and can be implemented at scale. Graphwise, which is the result of the merger between tech visionaries Ontotext and Semantic Web Company, has over 200 employees worldwide, with offices located across North America, Europe and APAC.
